text: WXKS-FM (107.9 FM), branded as Kiss 108, is a commercial Top 40/CHR radio station licensed to serve Medford, Massachusetts, and covering Greater Boston. Owned by iHeartMedia, the WXKS-FM studios are in Medford and the transmitter sits atop the Prudential Tower in Downtown Boston. Category:Contemporary hit radio stations in the United States Category:Boston
title: WXKS-FM
